definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: swell (?), honour, adorn, (NH [[הִדֵּר]] adorn; Aram. [[הַדַּר]] hadar Pa. adorn, honor; perh. all denom.; cf. Palm. n.pr.f. [[הדירת]] ornata, honorata Vog:No. 55; Ar.hadara be of no account; but also ferbuit (vinum) & 0’ahdaru inflatus, tumens  (venter))—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 2 ms. [[וְהָדַרְתָּ֫]] Le 19:32; Impf. 2 ms. [[תֶּהְדַּר]] Ex 23:3, Le 19:15; Pt. pass. [[הָדוּר]] Is 63:1, pl. [[הֲדוּרִים]] Is 45:2 (poss. [[הררים]] LXX o)/rh, cf. Di, but v. [[הר]])—
swell, only pt. pass. pl. Is 45:2 (si vera l.) in neuter sense, of hills, swelling places, swells of land (made level before Cyrus).

honour, pay honour to, sq. acc. ; in good sense [[וְהָדַרְתָּ פְּנֵי זׇקֵן]] Le 19:32 (H) and thou shalt honour the face of an old man (‖[[מִפְּנֵי שֵׂיבָה תָּקוּם]]); in bad sense (of partiality, favouritism) [[לאׁ תֶהְדַּר פְּנֵי גׇדוֹל]] Le 19:15 (H) (‖[[לאׁ תִשָּׂא פְנֵי־דָל]]); cf. [[וְדַל לאׁ תֶּהְדַּר בְּרִיבוֹ]] Ex 23:3 (JE; either rd. [[גׇּדׂל]] for [[ודל]],—[[ו]] not needed at beginning of v.,—so Kn SS al., yet LXX pe/nhta;—or suppose balancing cl., as Le 19:15, to have fallen out, cf. Di).
adorn, only pt. pass. adorned, made splendid [[הָדוֹר בִּלְבוּשׁוֹ]] Is 63:1.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. [[נֶהְדָָּרוֹ]] La 5:12 were (not) honoured, subj. [[פְּנֵי זְקֵנִים]].

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: Impf. juss. 2 ms. [[תִּתְהַדַּר]] Pr 25:6 honour oneself, i.e. claim honour.
